definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: The customs house shall make examination on the person under custody within the legal detention period.
sentences.chinese: 海關應當在法定扣留期限內對被扣留人進行審查。

sentences.english: Who would “Facebook China” censor and who not?
sentences.chinese: 誰來審查臉譜網中國，誰不會？

sentences.english: Assassination is the extreme form of censorship.
sentences.chinese: 暗殺是審查的極端形式。

sentences.english: Each review must be at least 500 words long.
sentences.chinese: 每個審查必須至少500字長。

sentences.english: He went over the plans again and discovered two mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 他再次審查計劃，發現兩處錯誤。

sentences.english: Google this year began to automatically transfer Chinese users to an uncensored website in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 今年開始將中國用戶自動跳轉到未經審查的香港網站。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the reception and examination of appeal should be standardized.
sentences.chinese: 再次，應規範立卷受理和立案審查兩個階段。

sentences.english: The basic requirements in nuclear safety review are clarified for class 1E cables of nu- clear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 闡明對核電廠1E級電纜核安全審查的基本要求。

sentences.english: The premarket approval was "federal safety review" that was specific to an individual device .
sentences.chinese: 在批准前是“聯邦安全審查”這是具體的個人設備。

sentences.english: In the long run of history, the censorship and the inquisitor have always lost.
sentences.chinese: 在歷史的長河中，審查制度和審查官總是迷失了方向。

sentences.english: In the long run of history, the censorship and the inquisitor have always lost.
sentences.chinese: 在歷史的長河中，審查制度和審查官總是迷失了方向。

sentences.english: Even the Chinese government hesitates to talk about censorship.
sentences.chinese: 即使中國政府談及審查制度含糊其辭。

sentences.english: I enrolled in an online school to become a private investigator.
sentences.chinese: 我報名參加網絡學校想成爲私家審查員。

sentences.english: In the early time of product design, we will wholly convene a checkup meeting for it .
sentences.chinese: 在產品設計初期，我們會專門召開設計審查會議。

definition: to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
